price: Um dia, em que nenhum aliado de nada valerá a outro aliado; e eles não serão socorridos,
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī mawlan ʿan mawlan shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
